sentence: In addition to Harriet Hageman, the challenger to Ms. Cheney, he is backing Joe Kent and Loren Culp, both of whom are running against House Republicans in Washington State who voted to impeach Mr. Trump.
title: The Right's Would-Be Kingmaker

sentence: Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler (R-Wash.) has also drawn a Trump-backed challenger, political neophyte Joe Kent.
title: Opinion: Republicans who voted to impeach Trump might be in less peril than people think

sentence: Against Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler, he's backed Army veteran Joe Kent.
title: Defiant GOP impeachment voters gear up for Trump-backed primaries

sentence: Army veteran Joe Kent got the Trump nod in a primary against Rep. Jaime Herrera Beutler (R-Wash.).
author: Cristina Marcos
title: Veteran lawmaker's exit has House GOP trending toward Trump

sentence: In southwestern Washington, Trump has endorsed former Army Green Beret Joe Kent against Herrera Beutler.
title: New lines, interesting races in Washington state

sentence: The GOP's supreme master is supporting Joe Kent, an Army veteran who has defended Putin's invasion of Ukraine, but that endorsement hasn't deterred his fellow Republicans, evangelical author Heidi St. John and state Rep. Vicki Kraft.
title: House Republicans all lead their challengers in recent fundraising

sentence: * Versus U.S. Representative Jaime Herrera Beutler * Aug 2 Republican primary for Washington's 3rd congressional district Former special forces officer Joe Kent has campaigned with far right U.S. representative Matt Gaetz of Florida and told Oregon Public Broadcasting he held a social media strategy call with white nationalist Nicholas Fuentes, though he said he disagreed with Fuentes' "ethno-nationalism."
author: Reuters
title: Factbox: Trump's endorsement power faces test in key elections
